page.title: 08CHANGES IN OUR VILLAGE
page.content: IN OUR VILLAGE THERE ARE LOTS OF NEW HOUSES BEING BUILT ROUND THE BACK OF THE STREET.THERE IS A NEW BUILDING SITE AND THREE NEW HOUSES BEING BUILT IN STATION ROAD.IN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE SOME HOUSES BEING REBUILT.THE OTHER NEW CHANGES ARE A NEW POLICEMAN,P.C. COOPER.ALSO THERE IS NEW FACTORY BEING BUILT IN STATION ROAD,THEY ARE ALSO REBUILDING A BIT OF THE RAILWAY WALL.IN THE VILLAGE THERE USE TO BE A SHOP CALLED THE PEOPLES STORE BUT IT WAS CLOSED DOWN AND TURNED INTO A WAREHOUSE FOR VENDING MACHINE SUPLIES.FROM INGLSTONE ROAD TO POPLAR LANE THEY ARE GOING TO BUILD NEW HOUSES.THE VILLAGE IS GETTING BUSIER SO THEY PUT SOME BOLLARDS UP ON EITHER SIDE OF THE HIGH STEET.NEW SHOPS HAVE BEEN BUILT IN YATE SO THE ONES IN WICKWAR HAVE HAD COMPETION.
